text: Bharat Kumar Shah () is a Nepalese politician. He is a member of Provincial Assembly of Madhesh Province from CPN (Maoist Centre). Sah, a resident of Gaushala, Mahottari, was elected via 2017 Provincial Assembly of Madhesh Province elections from Mahottari 1(B). ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Nepali Congress politicians Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Bharat Kumar Shah
